message: Well at my children's school it's the opposite. They try to avoid speaking to my husband and I in person. Over the phone as well and get mad because we show up frequently. Then they attempt to minimize the amount of time we speak. Trust not all parents avoid a teacher and not all teachers as well as schools these days care about their students like they portray.
